title: Lost Spirit

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit a player, looking for death.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you visit a killing role, you will force them to target you instead of their original target.
- In order for some killing roles to kill you, they must already be using their ability. When you visit them, if they cannot kill, or are choosing not to kill, your visit will have no effect.
- You can still redirect killing roles whose actions do not directly kill (ie: Arsonist will douse you)
- You cannot be protected in any way. Players who try to do so will be notified of this.
- Your killer will be unable to do anything the night after they kill you.
- You will lose if you are hanged.
- You cannot visit or be killed by other Peasants.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4445
*Her soaked rags dripped on the dark street. The rain is long gone, but its legacy carries on. The Lost Spirit wore a pendant with a picture of her husband in it, the parchment graying from age. She was shot, hanged, and burned at the stake each day - but the curse would not let her escape from her mortal coil.*
